name: MediVRation
description:
MediVRation is a simple VR experience to help you relax and unwind.

You'll find yourself on the front porch of a cabin in the woods as a thunderstorm plays out all around you. A brick pathway leads off into the trees.

MediVRation can be played as a sitting or standing experience.

Updates:

V0.5 September 3rd - 

  • Rotated player so default view is into the yard and not towards the house. 
  • Added in puddles on pathway. 
  • Added ripples in puddles 
  • Added in wind blowing rain around.

Known issues:

  • There's no menu as yet. You'll exit the game using SteamVR or Oculus controls.

To do:

  • Add a chair/bench to sit on
  • Make the chair adjustable in height and position so you can match it with a real world chair for full immersion
  • Implement in game controls for lightning
  • Implement in game controls for rain from a light shower to a monsoon
  • Puddles on the pathway
  • Water flowing off the roof (possibly)
  • Additional places to sit so you can choose to be here on the porch or out in the yard.
  • Additional props and features of the yard.
  • Birds flying around and landing nearby
  • New scenes.

MediVRation is free to download and use. Donations are welcome though.

Please leave comments and suggestions of anything you'd like to see and I'll see if I can accommodate you.
